contest-event.event-date:
July 18, 2010 D Yorkshire and Humberside Kiveton Park Entertainment contest
Kiveton Park Brass Festival 0 Entertainments Contest
kiveton-park-brass-festival
AKA Kiveton Community Woodland Brass Festival or Yorkshire and Humberside Kiveton Park Entertainment contest
Kiveton Park, Sheffield Best Soloist: Tom Wellings, Bass Trombone, Crofton Silver Best March: Crofton Silver Best Hymn: Crofton Silver Most Entertaining Band: Thurlstone Most Entertaining Item: Deepcar Best unplaced 4th Section band: Oughtibridge
Nov. 30, 2010, 9:09 a.m. Dec. 11, 2010, 11:56 p.m.
1 Crofton Silver Band Tim Sidwell
2 Thurlstone Brass Band Graham Bates
3 Hucknall and Linby Mining Community Brass Paul Whyley
4 Oughtibridge Band Alan Coe
5 Ireland Colliery Chesterfield Band Ian Knapton
6 Deepcar Brass Band Gavin Somerset
7 Thurcroft Welfare Ken Vernon
8 Clifton & Lightcliffe 'B' Band John Clay
9 Dronfield (CMW) Band John Davis
